author: Brandon Carey
comment: Nice clean and simple, the weather icon doesn't seem to change though would give it 5 stars if the weather icon updated.
Love this watchface.  A square watchface and the ability to select which elements are displayed in ambient mode would make it prefect

reply.author: shredzone
reply.content: Thank you! If you turn off the seconds bezel in the Digiface Android Wear preferences, it looks a little more squarish. 😀

author: theuploader N
comment: Amazing watch face. Great and very responsive developer. thank you.

author: Roycin D'souza
comment: Great watchface pack that's free and doesn't suck battery. Totally recommend if you like keeping things simple.

author: Martin Franson
comment: After adding the possibility to show watch hands it went really useful. Now I only wish for a setting to disable the digital time digits in the background, a possibility to set whatever color I want and maybe show sunrise and sunset times 😃

reply.author: shredzone
reply.content: I'm working on sunrise/sunset, should be coming with one of the next releases. But, well, a digiface without digits?! :-)

title: Analog watch face w/o digital wanted

author: A.J Mathew
comment: Please give an option for colors in ambient mode! Thanks devs :)

reply.author: shredzone
reply.content: Thank you! Colors in ambient mode is available in the current version. Just enable "Sleepless display" in the watch face settings.

title: Love it

reply.author: shredzone
reply.content: Smartwatch barometer sensors are supported now. Please update to the latest version.
